features: Made with pure shea butter and formulated without harsh ingredients
Packaging may vary, formulation remains unchanged.
description: Product Description Deeply cleans hair and scalp allowing hair to grow while unique sulfate-free formula helps reduce breakage. Made with pure shea butter and formulated without harsh ingredients, Cantu restores your real, authentic beauty. Embrace your curly, coily or wavy hair with Cantu. NO MINERAL OIL, SULFATES, PARABENS, SILICONES, PHTHALATES, GLUTEN, PARAFIN or PROPYLENE. Directions: Wet hair completely. Massage into wet hair beginning at the root and work towards the ends. Lather then rinse thoroughly with cool water. A second lather and rinse are recommended for hair with heavy product buildup. Styling Tip: For best results, use in conjunction with Cantu Sulfate-Free hydrating cream conditioner. Ingredients Water (Aqua, Eau), Sodium Alpha Olefin (C-14-16) Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Acrylates Copolymer, Cocamide Dipa, Glycerin, Glycol Distearate, Steareth-4, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Peg-150 Distearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Polyquaternium -39, Polyester-11, Sodium Hydroxide, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Disodium Dihydrogen Ethylenediaminetetraacetate, Dl Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate-20, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Benzyl Benzoate Directions apply to damp hair, massage gently, rinse and repeat if necessary Safety Warning Avoid contact with eyes and open or irritated skin. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If eye irritation persists, contact a physician. For external use only. If ingested, contact a physician or poison control centre immediately. Keep out of reach of children. Box Contains 1 x Cantu Shea Butter Natural Sulfate-Free Cleansing Cream Shampoo 400ml See more
